long_description: The compressible 4 fl. oz. humangear GoCup expands with a quick pull and collapses down small for easy packing in a purse, backpack or toiletry kit. Food-grade silicone cup is 100% leakproof. Included lid keeps the cup clean and doubles has a handy pill holder. Volume markings on the cup helps you measure fluids. humangear GoCup is BPA free and phthalate free.
short_description: The compressible 4 fl. oz. humangear GoCup expands with a quick pull and collapses down small for easy packing in a purse, backpack or toiletry kit.
